subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Josh Saunders had seven saves and recorded his second consecutive shutout, and New York City F.C. tied Colorado, 0-0, despite losing a player to a red card.
snippet: Josh Saunders had seven saves and recorded his second consecutive shutout, and New York City F.C. tied Colorado, 0-0, despite losing a player to a red card.
